a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Glaciers: change of mass of US glaciers
Cumulative mass balance of U.S. reference glaciers, relative to the base year 1965. This is given in meters of
water equivalent, which represent changes in the average thickness of a glacier.
Data source: EPA based on various sources (2021)
